column5: This is a list of all the Toho Godzilla films, as well as any films that are considered to take place in the Godzilla universe. It served as the roadmap for my Godzilla marathon. Hopefully, it can help others who want to go on this magical journey. You can find my ranked list for all of these here.

column2: Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack
